text: Luis Antonio Mendoza Castro (born August 21, 1973) is a Mexican football manager and former player. ==Career== Born in Villa Guerrero, State of Mexico, Mendoza made his professional debut with Deportivo Toluca F.C. in 1990.http://www.villaguerrero.com.mx/Conoce/Historia.html Mendoza became the manager of Ascenso MX side Murciélagos F.C. in 2017. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Deportivo Toluca F.C. players Category:Liga MX players Category:Mexican football managers Category:Footballers from the State of Mexico
title: Luis Antonio Mendoza
